metadata.title: USN-6017-1 -- Ghostscript vulnerability
metadata.description: Hadrien Perrineau discovered that Ghostscript incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6017-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ghostscript - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 ghostscript-x - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 libgs-dev - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 ghostscript-doc - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 libgs9 - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 libgs9-common - 9.55.0~dfsg1-0ubuntu5.2 No subscription required
